summary: Provides a suite of fast unit tests that validate the core functionality of the PixArtSigma image generation pipeline, covering inference behavior, handling of various image shapes, embedding integration, batch processing, component serialization, and CPU offload mechanisms.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability, correctness, and performance of the PixArtSigma pipeline for production use and continuous integration, enabling rapid detection of regressions and supporting efficient development workflows.
